title: CEO Brian Niccol Says Chipotle Navigating Covid Headwinds
itunes:title: CEO Brian Niccol Says Chipotle Navigating Covid Headwinds
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, talks about the CDC backing boosters from J&J and Moderna and shares his thoughts on mixing Covid shots. Bloomberg News Personal Finance Reporter Suzanne Woolley has details on the super-rich forming a new club that charges $180,000 for entry. Chipotle CEO Brian Niccol discusses quarterly earnings and the recovery of the fast-casual restaurant industry. Technology Futurist Ian Khan explains making the documentary “The Bitcoin Dilemma." And We Drive to the Close with Rebecca Corbin, CEO at Corbin Advisors.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
